alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN WAYNE, WESTERN SHELBY AND DARKE COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Coldwater to near Fountain City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Versailles, Union City, Ansonia, New Madison, Fountain City, Webster, Wayne Lakes, Greens Fork, Bethel, North Star, Hollansburg, Rossburg, Palestine, New Weston, Yorkshire, Whitewater, Darke County Airport, State Route 47 at US Route 127 and Eldora Speedway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
